meanings.definition: The act or process of converting something
meanings.sent1: Her conversions of old clothes into new designs were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The conversions of the warehouse into a cozy home took months.
meanings.sent3: The conversions of vegetables into funny faces made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: His conversions of sadness into strength inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The conversions of the garage into a spaceship were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A change in form, character, or function
meanings.sent1: The conversions of the caterpillar into a butterfly amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The conversions of the room into a classroom were quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The conversions of the song into a dance routine brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her conversions of fear into courage were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The conversions of the plain cake into a masterpiece left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The conversions of flour and sugar into a cake were delicious.
meanings.sent2: The conversions of hard work into success were evident.
meanings.sent3: The conversions of words into actions spoke louder than anything else.
meanings.sent4: His conversions of dreams into reality inspired many to do the same.
meanings.sent5: The conversions of the old building into a modern office were impressive.

meanings.sent1: Her conversions to a new faith brought her peace.
meanings.sent2: The conversions of the villagers to the new religion were celebrated.
meanings.sent3: The conversions of the family to a different belief sparked interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: His conversions to spirituality transformed his outlook on life.
meanings.sent5: The conversions of the community to a different faith were met with curiosity.

meanings.definition: The process of changing units of measurement
meanings.sent1: The conversions of inches to centimeters can be tricky for some.
meanings.sent2: The conversions of miles to kilometers are necessary for international travel.
meanings.sent3: The conversions of pounds to kilograms require precision in calculations.
meanings.sent4: Her conversions of Fahrenheit to Celsius were always accurate.
meanings.sent5: The conversions of gallons to liters are essential in cooking and baking.
